ygData.subject: Frostbite
ygData.msgSnippet: I know I have posted this before, but I am hoping somebody else may have some further input into this small Paladin Quest. One of the people in the Temple of
ygData.messageBody:
I know I have posted this before, but I am hoping somebody else may have
some further input into this small Paladin Quest.

One of the people in the Temple of Life mentions that a wolf named
"Frostbite" has killed one of the sacred fish and the body must be
recovered. The wolf is said to come to the temple with a local barbarian.

I have found frostbite in a nearby fishing village, but no sign of the
fish. Attacking him brings out the local barbarians with swords in hand,
and if you DO manage to kill the wolf there is no fish to be found in his
belly (he only gives up a pelt).

You can't lure him away from the camp, as he is standing in a fenced area.

Has anybody else taken this quest? Have any of you been able to solve the
quest? This one seems broken or maybe I'm just missing something.




Jolith
9th Level Half-Elf Paladin
Bound to Qeynos on Rodcet Nife
